evidence.pdf_reference: under visible light irradiation.Furthermore, the as-synthesized nanocatalyst can be reused 20 times without losing activity, showing its high stability.Interestingly, the novel heterostructured AgAgBrAgCl nanophotocatalyst also shows efficient visible light conversion of CO 2 to energetic fuels, e.g.methanolethanol.Therefore, the present route opens an avenue to achieve highly efficient visible-light-driven nanophotocatalysts for applications in environmental remediation and resourceful use of CO 2 .

without photocatalyst, and with polyhedral AgAgBr and commercial TiO 2 (P25) were also carried out. The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.

of 10 A7 Pa.The charge shift correction was made and the C 1s electron binding energy of 284.6 eV was used for calibration of the instrument.The XPS spectra were fitted using a combined polynomial and Shirley-type background function.
